title: T 206 Hall of Fame, Southern League/Tough Backs

posts.post_title: T 206 Hall of Fame, Southern League/Tough Backs
posts.post_content:
I have the followng T 206 for sale, I have scans of all fronts and backs.

Color on these cards is very nice some real toughies.

Here is the list:

Lundgren KC CAROLINA BRIGHTS crazy rare SGC 40 Nice card for the grade and toughin ANY grade                                         450.00

Lundgren KC Piedmont 350 PSA 5   
                         185.00
Chance Red Portrait Well centered Nice color Clean P 150 reverse PSA 4  200.00

George Brown Washington PSA 4 SOVEREIGN 350 Nice color   185.00

Speaker SGC 30 no creases mark on back nice color  150.00

Thornton PSA 4 Old MIll beautiful clean card, slight corner crease  180.00 
Otey Old Mill SGC 50 aother beautiful card    170.00
Kiernan Piedmont great color SGC 40   130.00
McCauley Old Mill SGC 40   120.00

Please e-mail me at [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url] ans I'll send along any and all scans.
Thanks all

I'll take the Speaker.

E-mail has been sent.

Cy

Speaker, Lundgren Carolina Brights and Brown Washington are sold. Everything else is available,
Thanks all.

Delighted to get the Lundgren KC -- you've made my night Doug.  As the Lundgren Chicago was my first ever T206, being finally able to have a high-quality KC card holds special meaning.
Thanks again,
--S
Lundgren KC is also Sold, The 4 Southern Leaguers are left.
Hey Doug- I'll take a Chance on Chance. Thanks, Bill

Doug,

I'll take the Thornton.

Thanks,

Jantz
All cards sold except Kiernan and McCauley. Thanks All!
